name: typescript-test
description: ##Quick start - `npm install` - `tsc -w` - `open index.html` (in another terminal tab) 	- open in localhost if you want live reload to work. I use [serve][0] `npm install serve` which creates <http://localhost:3000> serving the folder where you typed `serve` - You can now modify `main.ts` and it will compile to `main.js`
author: Justin Stahlman <jstahlman@mac.com> (http://www.stahlmandesign.com)

scripts.start: npm run transpile-typescript & npm run build
